sentence: Meanwhile Americans: pic.twitter.com/8VqnOPnTa7 Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (@RepMTG) February 9, 2022 Biden is sending free meth & crack pipes to minority communities in the name of ‘racial equity’ There is no end in sight for this lunacy https://t.co/RLv6cAuLCt pic.twitter.com/WdlzOojkdF Marco Rubio (@marcorubio) February 8, 2022 “Will you have to show your vaccine passport to get your crack pipe?” Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, posted on Twitter.
author: Maggie Valenti
title: Biden Enrages Conservatives By Supporting Harm Reduction With Safe Drug Kits

sentence: CPAC 2022 Speakers, in part, were the following: Donald Trump Ted Cruz Marco Rubio Ron DeSantis Kristi Noem Donald Trump Jr. Mike Pompeo Tulsi Gabbard Matt Gaetz Rick Scott Candace Owens Jim Jordan Conclusion: Oh, how these installed appeasers are laughing at the people who support them (Ephesians 4:14).
author: Bradlee Dean
title: The Show Must Go On: CPAC Brings You the Same Clowns with the Same Empty Promises

sentence: GOP leader Rep. Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) has called the JCPA “the antithesis of conservatism,” while Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) has warned it would give the media “cartel power.” Sens.
author: Allum Bokhari
title: Lindsey Graham Backs Democrat Led Bailout for Corporate Media
